objects.specification: A smooth, continuous floor covering spanning the entire classroom area, rendered in a pale green tone with a subtle texture that evokes a warm and inviting learning environment.
A smooth front wall painted in a light beige tone, with minimal surface detail to serve as a backdrop for mounted educational elements.
A smooth rear wall painted in a complementary light beige tone, designed to display educational posters and circadian elements.
A left side wall painted in a warm pale green hue, providing a soft contrast to the structural elements of the room.
A right side wall painted in a warm pale green tone, maintaining a consistent and inviting atmosphere throughout the classroom.
A large rectangular window with light blue tinted glass and slim frame, designed to admit natural light and provide a view outside.
Soft, flowing fabric curtains in a pale beige tone, with gentle folds and a lightweight texture to complement the window.
A large teacher’s desk featuring a darker wood-tone finish, broad tabletop surface with subtle natural grain, sturdy legs, and a professional design balanced for classroom use.
A large rectangular dark matte board, framed in light wood, with a smooth writing surface suitable for chalk or marker use.
A student desk with a natural wood-tone finish, rectangular top with gentle bevels, supported by slim metal legs painted in an earthy hue.
A student chair with an ergonomic backrest, earthy prehistoric tone finish, padded seat cushion, and slender legs.
